::Wheeljack/Skulletron/Lavacons::

           Wheeljack nodded.

         "=
Ok buddy, be careful out there," He said to himself.

          Wheeljack w=
as approaching the base.  The board had arrived safely with the probe.

   =
    "Good job.  Now, I better get Zardus," He opened his com, "Zardus, the =
probe has been retrieved.  Gotron didn't return, he said he would contact y=
ou about a war with Megatron.  I believe you might want to see this probe, =
it has a message for you, I think."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~
::Skulletron::

      Skulletron continued walking around the CF.  As =
he was walking, an autogun just popped up and started firing at him.  Skull=
etron got hit in the side, and some mech fluid poured out.  He grabbed his =
raygun and fired three direct blasts at the autogun, and it broke down.  Ou=
ch!  Skulletron held onto his injured side, as he sort of limped.  It would=
n't be long until some Maximal came and fried him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Dark Lavacons::

          The Dark Lavacons gave a l=
oud hurrah to their victory, and spread dark flame in celebration.  Then, t=
hey heard what Starscream said.  Hmmmm.......How were they supposed to know=
??  They were mindless killers!!!

       Astral laughed evilly, and blew d=
ark flame in the air, and said, "We'll stay here, only if you give us somet=
hing to terminate!!!!  KILL!!!!!! DESTROY!!!!!!!!!"
